com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.logUtils

类 Logs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.logUtils.Logs

  • public final class Logs
extends java.lang.Object
    A useful log class to help you auto add Tag and easy to disable log You can simply use Logs instead of Log
